title: Rolling Drafting Chair Adjustable Tall Shop Stool with Backrest and Footrest for Computer,Studio,Workshop,Classroom, Lab, Counter, Home Office (Black)
features: Our Work from Home Office Chair with wheels are perfect for those who are looking for a comfortable and effortless work experience. The shop stool with wheels is upholstered with the finest soft PVC leather and designed with a stylish ergonomic backrest that eases pain and discomfort in your back and spine.

Quiet Smooth Rolling: Durable stylish reinforced nylon casters for easy movement on all flooring without scratches.Swivel around to discuss with your teammates, glide freely between your desks, or wheel over for a quick break with these quality caters
Sturdy Construction: Heavy-duty metal base and structured screw allow this rolling chair weight capacity high to 400lbs
Our tool-free easy assembly drafting chair is the perfect studio chair for those who value convenience and comfort.With a sleek design, easy assembly, and no tools needed.
description: ENJOY YOUR SEAT, ENJOY YOUR WORK! Grace & Grace Professional Office Series, the fantastic comfortable chair is designed to delight your rigorous daily work! Guaranteed satisfaction, you may contact us and get FREE replacement if any quality problem within 1 year.

Designed for comfort and stylish, the Swivel Chair with ergonomic backrest will help you to go through a busy day with high productivity. Easily adjustment for the seat height, the backrest depth and backrest tilt, move with you smoothly from here to there in the room, this chair is perfectly fit for Office, Computer, Lab, Workshop, Classroom, etc. Superior parts and craftsmanship allows for daily usage of up to 400lbs of weight.

Grace&Grace are top manufacture at China specialized in advanced Office and Home furniture, and our products have been exported to US, Europe, Japan and Australia for decades with pretty good reputation. We are dedicated to provide our customers the professional solution for quality life, and we expect you have the most rewarding experience at purchasing and using our products.
